005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IGroupable;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelDefinition;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelInstance;
012
013import java.util.List;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017/**
018 * Represents a Metaschema module {@link IModelDefinition} node that is part of
019 * a model diagram.
020 */
021public interface IDiagramNode {
022  /**
023   * The Metaschema module definition associated with this node.
024   *
025   * @return the definition
026   */
027  @NonNull
028  IModelDefinition getDefinition();
029
030  /**
031   * The identifier of the node used for cross-referenceing.
032   *
033   * @return the identifier
034   */
035  @NonNull
036  String getIdentifier();
037
038  /**
039   * The human-readable label for the node.
040   *
041   * @return the label
042   */
043  @NonNull
044  default String getLabel() {
045    return getDefinition().getEffectiveName();
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Get the sequence of scalar data points associated with the definition.
050   *
051   * @return the sequence
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  List<IAttribute> getAttributes();
055
056  /**
057   * Get the sequence of relationships between this and other nodes.
058   *
059   * @return the sequence
060   */
061  @NonNull
062  List<IEdge> getEdges();
063
064  /**
065   * Represents a scalar-valued data point associated with a node.
066   */
067  interface IAttribute {
068    /**
069     * Get the node containing the attribute.
070     *
071     * @return the node
072     */
073    @NonNull
074    IDiagramNode getNode();
075
076    /**
077     * The human-readable label for the attribute.
078     *
079     * @return the label
080     */
081    @NonNull
082    String getLabel();
083
084    /**
085     * Get the data type for the attribute.
086     *
087     * @return the data type
088     */
089    @NonNull
090    IDataTypeAdapter<?> getDataType();
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Represents a relationship between a subject node and a target node.
095   */
096  interface IEdge {
097    /**
098     * Get the subject node that owns the edge.
099     *
100     * @return the node
101     */
102    @NonNull
103    IDiagramNode getNode();
104
105    /**
106     * Get the relationship type.
107     *
108     * @return the relationship
109     */
110    @NonNull
111    Relationship getRelationship();
112
113    /**
114     * Get the associated Metaschema definition instance the edge is based on.
115     *
116     * @return the instance
117     */
118    @NonNull
119    IModelInstance getInstance();
120
121    /**
122     * A visitor dispatch method used to process the edge.
123     *
124     * @param visitor
125     *          the visitor to use for dispatch
126     */
127    void accept(@NonNull IDiagramNodeVisitor visitor);
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * The nature of a relationship between two nodes.
132   */
133  enum Relationship {
134    ZERO_OR_ONE,
135    ONE,
136    ZERO_OR_MORE,
137    ONE_OR_MORE;
138
139    /**
140     * Get the relationship based on the provided grouping information.
141     *
142     * @param groupable
143     *          the grouping information
144     * @return the relationship
145     */
146    @NonNull
147    public static Relationship toRelationship(@NonNull IGroupable groupable) {
148      return toRelationship(groupable.getMinOccurs(), groupable.getMaxOccurs());
149    }
150
151    @NonNull
152    private static Relationship toRelationship(int minOccurs, int maxOccurs) {
153      return minOccurs < 1
154          ? maxOccurs == 1
155              ? IDiagramNode.Relationship.ZERO_OR_ONE
156              : IDiagramNode.Relationship.ZERO_OR_MORE
157          : maxOccurs == 1
158              ? IDiagramNode.Relationship.ONE
159              : IDiagramNode.Relationship.ONE_OR_MORE;
160    }
161  }
162}
